#text=Sometimes , something happens that can really just ruin your day .
#text=Take , for example , going for a fun bicycle ride only to have the tire go flat !
#text=When something like this happens , it can seem like a big deal , but is only a small inconvenience .
#text=I do n't even know how to repair a flat bicycle tire , but I know how I could do it myself .
#text=First , I would read about how to fix it and maybe look at a video from the internet .
#text=After I have learned how to repair it , I would go to the store to get some supplies .
#text=I would need the tools to fix it and a new tire or things to use for the repair .
#text=After arriving home , I would review the things I learned about how to repair the tire and I would follow the directions .
#text=Once it was repaired , I would test out the bicycle to make sure it was repaired and then I would clean up .
